description:
After MTV announced that the network’s Scream adaptation had been picked up to series, news spread that the show did not have the rights to use the iconic Ghostface mask that is synonymous with the franchise. You may have been one of the many fans scratching your head wondering: How is this Scream without the Scream mask?! MTV电视台早前宣布将会开发经典电影《惊声尖叫》美剧版，不过最新消息是，这部美剧版的《惊声尖叫》没有拿到经典鬼脸面具的使用权。这就让不少粉丝们好奇：没有鬼脸面具的话，还能拍《惊声尖叫》？！

In an effort to subvert expectations and create a wholly unique experience, the series has created a mask of its own. Similarly inspired by the Edvard Munch painting, the show’s mask will have a more, ahem, organic feel. (Early word is that it’ll be made of flesh, but TPTB are still developing it.)在确认无望使用经典版《惊声尖叫》鬼脸面具的消息后，制作团队决定创作一个美剧版的鬼脸面具。和Edvard  Munch画的这个原版的基础上，美剧版将会更加…咳咳…有一种有机的感觉。

“It’s a darker, almost more grounded, evolved version of the mask,” says Mina Lefevre, MTV’s senior vice president and head of scripted development. “It’s something we’re constantly talking about. How did that mask become that mask? What’s its purpose? How did it evolve? If the Scream movie mask was the more plastic version, for a lack of a better description, this one is a more organic looking and frankly darker version.”“我们的版本将会更加黑暗，”MTV副总Mina Lefevre透露。“我们一直都在聊，那个面具是怎么变成那个面具的？目的是什么？怎么进化而来？如果说电影版的面具有一种塑料的感觉，那我们的电视版看起来就会更加有机、更黑暗。”
